lyrics:
5 contributorsemotional lyricsverse 1
i knew you when
i had a friend
very deeply
love lived within
but somehow we got loose
from what was oh so tight
somewhere we went wrong
when we were oh so right

prechorus
whats a man to do when he just cant take no more
oh whats a man to do
what am i to do when my heart leads me to the door
now ive tried and tried again
but now this is the end
tell me whats the use of holding on
if we cant be friends

chorus
im emotional and i cant let go woah and i cant let go let go
i am trying to hold on to you im trying to hold on to you
though it hurts me so hurts me so gotta let you know gotta let you know
that the love we once shared now is through
say goodbye to you
see carl thomas liveget tickets as low as 80you might also likeverse 2
you seem to hurt
me purposely
i didnt understand it
oh girl why me
i had no choice
what was best for us
was to terminate our love and be free

prechorus
whats a man to do when he just cant take no more
oh whats a man to do yeah
what am i to do when my heart leads me to the door
now weve tried and tried again
but now this is the end
tell me whats the use of holding on
if we cant be friends

chorus
im emotional and i cant let go and i cant let you go
i am trying to hold on to you im trying to hold on you
though it hurts me so oh gotta let you know
that the love we once shared now is through
say goodbye to you
im emotional and i cant let go sayin goodbye to you woah woah yeah
i am trying to hold on to you im trying to hold on
though it hurts me so though it hurts me so gotta let you know gotta let you know
that the love we once shared now is through love we once shared
say goodbye to you
prechorus
whats a man to do when he just cant take no more
oh whats a man to do yeah
what am i to do when my heart leads me to the door
oh now weve tried and tried again
but now this is the end
tell me whats the use of holding on
if we cant be friends

chorus

though it hurts me so gotta let you know i got to let you go
that the love we once shared now is through can i let you know the once that we once shared was through
say goodbye to you
im emotional im emotional and i cant let go look at me i cant stop crying
i am trying to hold on to you inside my heart its slowly dying
though it hurts me so ohho gotta let you know gotta gotta let you know
that the love we once shared now is through the love that we once shared you know is through2embed
